summary: A group of friends use an ancient coffin to experience the world as ghosts. Inspired by true events.
cast: Aaron Dean Eisenberg|Liz Fenning|J. Walter Holland|Jared Grey|Domiziano Arcangeli|Jeffrey Damnit|Hans Uder|Wes Aderhold|Ruby Laurelle Staley|Desmond Lawrence|Ford Austin|Edy Ganem|Scott Svatos|Greg Maness|Edoardo Beghi|Naomi Ueno|Matthias Balke|Paul Louis Harrell|Ian Scott Rudolph|Mauro Borrelli|Ed Polgardy|Vin Nucatola|Brad Littlefield|Erskine Bonilla|Mike Dunay|Bradley Holzer|John McCutcheon|Shawn Mowlai|Hilary Novelle|Karen Teliha|Don Yanan
title: The Ghostmaker
